==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
Originally as {{zh-l|*𠂇}} in the oracle bone script: {{liushu|p}} – a left hand. Compare {{zh-l|*又|right hand}}.

Late bronze inscription forms show an added {{zh-l|*工|work; to assist?}} component, i.e. the current form is a {{Han compound|𠂇|工|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|nocap=1}}, representing the original form of {{och-l|佐|to assist}}.
